title: Operation Swallow: The Battle for Heavy Water (1948) War film directed by Jean Dréville

sources.title: Operation Swallow: The Battle for Heavy Water (1948) War film directed by Jean Dréville
sources.description:
A factual reconstruction of the sabotage which took place to prevent Germany from getting the heavy water needed to make an atomic bomb during World War II.

Directors: Jean Dréville, Titus Vibe-Müller
Writers: Jean Marin, Arild Feldborg, Diana Robertson
Stars: Raoul Dautry, Frédéric Joliot-Curie, Lew Kowarski
Genres: Action, Drama, History, War

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
